original_text: He told the man who was taking the message, ‘When you finish giving my report to the king, 20 the king may be angry. He may ask you, “Why did you go and fight so near to the city? Surely you knew that they would shoot arrows from the walls.
korean_text: 그 전령에게 명령하여 이르되 전쟁의 모든 일을 네가 왕께 보고하기를 마친 후에

sentences.original_text: He told the man who was taking the message
When you finish giving my report to the king
Why did you go and fight so near to the city?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 성에서 그렇게 가까운 곳에서 싸우러 갔느냐?

sentences.original_text: Surely you knew that they would shoot arrows from the walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성벽에서 활을 쏠 것이라는 것을 분명히 알고 있었을 것이다
